game.name: BIOSZARD Corporation
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a near future, BIOSZARD Dev grew powerful and wealthy. The once small game development studio turned into a global scale corporation seeking to dominate, buying corrupted politicians and crazy scientists to transform humans into beasts, zombies and other unspeakable things.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a near future, BIOSZARD Dev grew powerful and wealthy. The once small game development studio turned into a global scale corporation seeking to dominate, buying corrupted politicians and crazy scientists to transform humans into beasts, zombies and other unspeakable things.

reviewHighlights.text: 좀만 다듬었으면 재밌는 수준까진 왔을텐데... 무기를 한개밖에 못드는 문제. 기본 권총은 무한인데 다른총을 들면 권총을 못씀 탄창을 모아놓을 수가 없고 중간 장전이 불가능 무기를 드는즉시 최대 탄약이 되고 이전 총알은 세이브가 안됨 총을 다써야 장전이 되어서 미리 대비...
